column5: New listing just in time for game days! No matter how the game turns out you win with 2 houses. Havenly Place with its fabulous wrap around porch and Havenly Too with its ever so popular tiny house loft. Enjoy pool volleyball, foosball, miniature golf with final hole floating in the pool, tail gate toss, hammock, bbq, basketball, 3 fire pits... Enjoy!
column8: New Listing - for Game Day Rental!
